isis.stitle: 10 SPEED TRANSMISSIONS FULLER RT-610 SERIES - INSTALL - AIR VALVE

step1.para: If previously removed, install the fittings on the air valve.
Install the actuating pin and spring in the bore in the transmission ( Figure 179).

figure.caption: Figure 179. Install Actuating Pin and Spring

step1.para: Make sure the alignment sleeve is installed in the air valve ( Figure 180).

figure.caption: Figure 180. Make Sure Alignment Sleeve is Installed in Air Valve

note.para: Before installing the alignment sleeve, check the bore in the air valve to make sure the piston is either in a forward or rear position. Piston can be moved with air or pencil.

step1.para: Install the air valve on the transmission, and tighten bolts evenly and securely. Actuating plunger in the case fits into alignment sleeve in the air valve ( Figure 181).

figure.caption: Figure 181. Install Air Valve on Transmission

step1.para: Install fittings in the shift cylinder, if previously removed. This consists of two 90 degree street ells.
Install the high range air line between the air port in the rear cover of the air cylinder and the side rear port of the air valve ( Figure 182).

figure.caption: Figure 182. Install High Range Air Line

step1.para: Install the low range air line from the air port in the top of the cylinder to the street ell in the top of the air valve side cap ( Figure 183).

figure.caption: Figure 183. Install Low Range Air Line
